Title: Prohibits the possession of an open container of cannabis or cannabis product in the passenger area of certain motor vehicles
Summary: Prohibits the possession of an open container of cannabis or cannabis product in the passenger area of certain motor vehicles.
LawCode: Amd ยง1227, add ยง1227-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to prohibiting the possession of an open container of cannabis, cannabis product, or cannabis paraphernalia in the passenger area of certain motor vehicles
